description: Title of experiment, your name, contact details, abstract that describes experiment
Sets the context, explains why study needs to be done, state hypothesis and predictions
Decribed well enough for someone else to replicate design
Clear text should be able to stand alone including description of statistics
Restate findings in brief and then propose significance of the work
At least 5 recent papers on topic and 2 on design decisions
Figure legend describing what the figure shows.
